products.description: Sio merino made to measure vertical blind.

products.title: Sio Merino Navy 89mm Vertical Blind
products.description: Their sio collection intruduces stylish modern patterns to your window dressing. Their sio meriono navy will make a chic addition to your home. Pair with dark wooden tones throughout the home for a look that can not be surpassed. The polyester fabric is decorative whilst providing a sleek and practical window covering. Product id: sdb-vtb1453 fabric colour: merino navy material: 100% polyester headrail: white slimline headrail supported by white steel brackets - top or face fixable slat width: 89mm control type: smooth chain operation with cord tilt or wand tilt and pull energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - effective thermal retention light filtering: yes sio merino navy 89mm vertical blind in blue.

products.title: Bari Spc, Merino - Vertical Blind
products.description: For a traditional yet modern window display, opt for the bari spc merino, a contemporary blind with adjustable louvres. This practical feature allows you to move the slats accordingly, filtering the desired amount of light and breeze. And if that wasn't enough, this quality fabric also carries a solar protective coating that repels the suns heat without affecting the fabric. Use the merino in your master bedroom to form a sophisticated colour scheme.
